front.title: High Capacity Textual Conventions for MIB Modules Using Performance History Based on 15 Minute Intervals
front.abstract: This document presents a set of High Capacity Textual Conventions for use in MIB modules which require performance history based upon 15 minute intervals. The Textual Conventions defined in this document extend the conventions presented in RFC 3593 to 64 bit resolution using the conventions presented in RFC 2856. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
